description: Seer helps retail salespeople create and send personalized shoppable Lookbooks to their customers via email and sms.

founders.name: Christina Czap, Founder
founders.description: Christina is a former Director at Vogue and top grossing salesperson at some of the most recognizable companies and brands such as Moda Operandi, Alexander McQueen and Miu Miu.

founders.name: Felipe Saint-Jean, Founder
founders.description: Felipe has a PhD from Yale in Computer Science and is a visionary developer whose platforms have millions of users. He has been behind some of the most innovative and progressive products in both the consumer and B2B space. From the creation of a remote learning solution for NY DoE, to fanning the flames of global football fans via the most downloaded fantasy gaming app in the world to working with the government in South America on building effective education software.

# Software that helps luxury sales associates sell more.
Seer helps luxury sales associates create personalized, click-worthy sales content that increases customer engagement and drives sales.
## The way of THE Seer.
### Create personalized, click-worthy content in minutes.
Build bespoke, shoppable, magazine-style edits with ease.
### Send and communicate across all channels.
Deliver content where your clients want it most - email, text message, video chat & more.
### Track your results and optimize your efforts.
See real-time opens, clicks, and views so you can follow-up quickly and close sales effectively.
[Request A DemO+](https://www.helloseer.com/<#contact>)
#### Sell beyond the store.
# Navigating change is never easy, but with access to the right technology, you can stay ahead of your competition and thrive. Together, we can move fashion forward.
##### We are Seer. Who are you?
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
### Built for sales, by sales.
As a top-grossing stylist, Christina Czap, our cofounder, spent countless hours tracking down quality images, texting detailed recommendations, and advising her discerning clients. Customized look-books, created with solutions like Photoshop and Keynote, proved critical to her success but consumed her nights, weekends and even vacations. She knew there had to be a better way. We like to say that Seer, born out of Christina’s own pain points, was 15 years in the making. ‍We know your teams don’t have time to tinker with new programs or click back and forth between multiple windows. We’ve made Seer as intuitive for the associate as it is elegant for the customer.
Christina Czap
Co-Founder, CEO 
Christina is a former Director at Vogue and top-grossing salesperson at Moda Operandi, Alexander McQueen, Prada, and other globally recognizable brands. The culmination of over 15 years in luxury retail, her intimate knowledge of the expectations of clients, the needs of sales associates, and the shortcomings of existing technologies inspired Seer.
Felipe Saint-Jean
Co-Founder, CTO
Felipe, a serial entrepreneur and acclaimed developer, has created platforms that boast millions of users. From creating a remote learning solution for New York City’s Department of Education to fanning the flames of football fandom with one of the most downloaded fantasy gaming apps in the world, Felipe is behind some of the most progressive products in the consumer and B2B space. He holds a PhD from Yale in Computer Science and has worked with Christina to design a product that is as intuitive as it is innovative.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f7bacd0f6ad6f4ba1a2f67d/5f7cb872e340a5790e9a01e2_logo-white-seer.svg)
Sell beyond the store.

generated_description:
**Seer: Selling Beyond the Store**

Founded in 2019 and incubated in Y Combinator's W21 batch, Seer is taking the luxury retail market by storm from its Menlo Park, CA headquarters. With a dedicated team of four—including industry veterans like CEO Christina Czap, a former Vogue Director, and CTO Felipe Saint-Jean, a renowned entrepreneur—the company is laser-focused on empowering luxury sales associates.

### Mission Statement
Seer's mission is simple yet profound: to sell beyond the store. They achieve this by enabling retail salespeople to design and distribute personalized, shoppable Lookbooks that captivate customers.

### The Problem They Solve
Sales associates in luxury retail face a mountain of challenges—hours spent on tedious tasks like sourcing quality images and crafting detailed recommendations can sap their time and creativity. Christina Czap's firsthand experiences as a top-grossing stylist shaped the vision for Seer. She curated the platform to streamline the creation of bespoke, magazine-style content that resonates with discerning clients, eliminating operational headaches.

### Key Features
1. **Quick Content Creation**: Seer allows you to whip up personalized, click-worthy content in a matter of minutes. No need for complex design software; it’s all about creating shoppable edits that look fabulous.
   
2. **Multi-channel Communication**: Whether clients prefer an email, text message, or video chat, Seer ensures that content is delivered in a way that suits them best.

3. **Performance Tracking**: The platform helps you monitor real-time engagement metrics like opens, clicks, and views, empowering sales associates to follow up effectively and close deals faster.

### Founders' Background
- **Christina Czap**, CEO: With over 15 years in luxury retail, Christina has graced the sales floors of high-end brands like Prada and Alexander McQueen. Her deep understanding of client expectations and sales associate needs informed the creation of Seer.
  
- **Felipe Saint-Jean**, CTO: Felipe boasts a wealth of experience from building platforms that cater to millions, including educational solutions and popular gaming apps. His technical prowess complements Christina's industry insights to build a seamless user experience.

### Why It Matters
In an increasingly digital marketplace where consumers expect exceptional experiences, Seer equips luxury sales professionals with the tools they need to meet and exceed these expectations. By combining elegance with efficiency, Seer not only helps sales associates sell more but also elevates the overall customer experience.

As the retail landscape shifts, Seer positions itself as a vital ally for luxury brands aiming to thrive in a future where customer engagement and personalized service reign supreme. 

For anyone looking to enhance their luxury retail game—or just curious about this innovative platform—check out [Seer's website](https://www.helloseer.com/). 

In essence, Seer embodies the age-old adage: necessity is the mother of invention, perfectly honed by the trials of experience. And they’re here to help the fashion world move forward.
